title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, June 14, 2021
description: It’s the birthday of Harriet Beecher Stowe (1811), abolitionist author of “Uncle Tom's Cabin; or, Life Among the Lowly.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
